Advertisements

Advertisements in the Egyptian Gazette were produced using boilerplates that repeated from issue to issue with only minor variations. This page’s database contains a complete set of these advertisements. Each advertiser is given a three-letter code, and each distinct ad from that advertiser is given a numeric suffix. Use the images and links to text below, or consult the separate database, XML files, or image files.

Every ad template has an XML id embedded in it, following this format: xml:id="deg-ad-xxx01".
